lung_exam: high-pitched inspiratory 'squeaks' and 'pops' in both lungs diffusely
relevant_findings.abdominal_exam: very mild tenderness in the mid-epigastrium

symptoms: worsened hypoxemia with intermittent decline in oxygen saturation to 75%

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression of respiratory distress with worsening hypoxemia

relevant_findings.procedure: endotracheal intubation and initiation of mechanical ventilation
bronchoscopy_findings: thin, foamy secretions in the left and right bronchi

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial signs of respiratory distress progressed to requiring mechanical ventilation
